title: AWS Network Access Control List (ACL) Rule
description: Describes an AWS network ACL rule. See the VPC [documentation](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonVPC/latest/UserGuide/VPC_ACLs.html) for more information.

rule_no.description: The number of the rule for ordering.

action.description: The action that should be implemented (allow/deny).

cidr_block.description: The cidr to associate this rule to.

from_port.description: The from port number, 0 for all.

to_port.description: The to port number, 0 for all.
